name: fairdealapi
description: A RESTful API, CRUD backend, and demo portfolio app for  a fictional mechanic shop built using Node.js, Express.js framework, Sequelize ORM on a MySQL database for persistence. Inspired by minor work I did for my own mechanic.
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle: SystemsVanguard | URL: www.RyanHunter.org | Email: ryan@RyanHunter.org | Location: Brampton ON Canada in the Greater Toronto Area.
